summary: The course 'Data Science & GenAI למנהלים טכנולוגיים' is a hybrid workshop designed for data managers, offered by Bar-Ilan University's School of High-Tech and Cyber. The course begins on December 19, 2024, and spans 5 sessions, each lasting from 17:30 to 21:30, totaling 25 academic hours. Participants can choose to attend either on-campus in Ramat Gan or via Zoom. The curriculum covers a comprehensive range of topics in data science and generative AI, including an overview of artificial intelligence and machine learning, supervised, unsupervised, and semi-supervised learning, model selection, deep learning concepts, reinforcement learning, and the complete data science pipeline process. Additionally, the course delves into data science operation management, focusing on managing data science initiatives, building and managing data science units, and implementing successful organizational ML-OPS processes. Participants will also explore data science tools and technologies, industry trends, real-world use cases, and best practices. The course emphasizes generative AI, including off-the-shelf solutions, platforms, self-development, and hybrid approaches, with key methodologies such as prompt engineering, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), preferences fine-tuning (PFT), supervised fine-tuning (SFT), and more. The program also addresses project milestones, technologies, and processes like tokenization, embedding, and vector databases.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Data Science & GenAI למנהלים טכנולוגיים

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is a hybrid workshop designed for technological managers, focusing on data science and generative AI. It is hosted by Bar-Ilan University's School of High-Tech and Cyber. The program aims to equip participants with advanced knowledge and practical skills in data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning, tailored for managerial roles.

TARGET AUDIENCE: Technological managers interested in data science and generative AI.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: Not specified.

PREREQUISITES: Not specified.

CERTIFICATIONS: Not specified.

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: 19.12.2024.
- Days: Mondays and Thursdays.
- Hours: 17:30-21:30.
- Duration: 5 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 25.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes will be held on Bar-Ilan University's campus in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on participants' preferences.

TUITION AND FEES: Not specified.

COURSE TOPICS:
1. Data Science:
   - Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Overview.
   - Supervised, Unsupervised, and Semi-Supervised Learning.
   - Model Selection, including straightforward models and ensembled models.
   - Deep Learning: Neural Networks Concepts & Engineering.
   - Reinforcement Learning.
   - The complete data science pipeline process.

2. Data Science Operation Management:
   - Managing Data Science Initiatives Life Cycle.
   - Building and managing the data science unit efficiently.
   - Successful organizational ML-OPS process.
   - Data Science Tools & Technologies.

3. Data Science Tools & Technologies:
   - Industry and market watch.
   - Real-world use cases and best practices.
   - Large Language Models (NLP / NLU) and Omni Models.
   - Generative AI: off-the-shelf solutions, platforms, self-development, and hybrid approaches.
   - Key approaches: Prompt Engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Preferences Fine-Tuning (PFT), Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT), etc.
   - Project milestones, technologies, and processes (e.g., tokenization, embedding, vector databases, etc.).

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:
- To schedule an admission interview and register:
  - Phone: 052-5886002.
  - Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION:
- Hosted by Bar-Ilan University's School of High-Tech and Cyber.
- Managed by the מערך לתוכניות ייעודיות (Specialized Programs Division) at Bar-Ilan University.
